text: This article covers the 2014 football season in Chile. ==National tournaments== ===Primera División=== *Clausura Champion: Colo-Colo **Topscorer: Esteban Paredes *Apetura Champion: Club Universidad de Chile **Topscorer: Esteban Paredes ===Copa Chile=== *Champion: Deportes Iquique **Topscorer: Rodrigo Díaz ==National team results== The Chile national football team results and fixtures for 2014. ===2014 FIFA World Cup=== ====Friendly matches==== ==Record== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! width=250| Competition ! width=30| ! width=30| ! width=30| ! width=30| ! width=30| ! width=30| |- | align="left"| International Friendly | 9 | 6 | 2 | 1 | 20 | 5 |- | align="left"| 2014 FIFA World Cup | 4 | 2 | 1 | 1 | 6 | 4 |- | Total | 13 | 8 | 3 | 2 | 26 | 9 |} ==Goal scorers== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" |- ! Player !
